data.title: 1 - What is Dmanager
data.description: DManager is fast, free and private browser with desktop-class file management.Download manager with resumable downloads

data.title: 2 - Introduction
data.description: Reworked navigation, smooth page loading, Bookmarks grid instead of home screen

data.title: 3 - New Version Features
data.description: In new version browser is significantly improved, Tabs (upon your request) with popup blocker

data.title: 4 - Documents
data.description: Document Manager is indexing and shortlist files. The files like as xls, pdf, doc, txt, zip, rar. In this app manage PDF, Text, Word, Excel and PowerPoint documents at one place. This is very simple and user friendly app. Get list of all documents available in your smart phone at single place.

data.title: 5 - Tips
data.description: Organize files in folders, sort by name/date/size/kind, Safari-like web-browser

data.title: 6 - More Features
data.description: Passcode lock with Touch ID and Face ID support! Download manager with resumable downloads

data.title: 7 - conclusion
data.description: DManager is fast, free and private browser with desktop-class file management.
